text: Maya Lakshmi Harris (born January 30, 1967) is an American lawyer, activist, commentator and writer. Harris was one of three senior policy advisors for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign's policy agenda. She also was the chair of the 2020 presidential campaign of her sister, Kamala Harris. Harris has been married to Tony West since July 1998. She has a daughter, Meena Harris, from a previous relationship and raised her on her own. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Kamala Harris Category:American political commentators Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:Lawyers from Oakland, California Category:Writers from Oakland, California Category:Writers from Urbana, Illinois Category:People from Champaign, Illinois Category:American political activists
title: Maya Harris
